name: Walker (itch) (DogCatSprings)
description:
Walker is a 2D game, about a little spaceman exploring the universe. He constantly moves, but you can use the mouse to flip him. You can also move the platforms. This was made with Unity and Procreate. 

Information about the game maker, DogCatSprings.

DogCatSprings is a tiny, one-person company, but I’m always looking for people to join. I am 13 at the moment and looking for people around that age. 

I appreciate any feedback, no matter how harsh!
